source.2480d6e5:
def split_name(e):
    fam=''
    fa=e.split(' ')[1::]

    if len(fa)>1:
        le=len(fa)
        for i in range(le):
            fam=fam+' '+fa[i]
        #print(fam)
        
    else:
        fam=fa[0]
    return fam
df['family']=df['name'].apply(split_name)
#df[['name','family']]
df['family'].value_counts().head()
